title: Something Pacific
brief_description: Nam June Paik’s Something Pacific (1986) is made up of TVs buried in the grass outside and an interactive video wall within the building at the University of Southern California San Diego’s Media Center and is part of the Stuart Collection.

constellations_other.name: Lost and found
constellations_other.description: Blossoming from Alice Guy Blaché’s The Cabbage-Patch Fairy, this Constellation explores the impermanence and enduring nature of the moving image.

description: Nam June Paik’s Something Pacific (1986) is made up of TVs buried in the grass outside and an interactive video wall within the building at the University of Southern California San Diego’s Media Center and is part of the Stuart Collection.
